name: ClickCatToe
storyline: In Cat Clicker, you embark on a fun adventure to collect points by clicking on an adorable cat. Each click counts as a step in your quest to earn more points and unlock special bonuses. The story is simple yet charming: help the cat collect points while enjoying retro style and addictive gameplay. Click away and watch your score grow in this fun-filled casual game!
summary:
Cat Clicker

Welcome to Cat Clicker! This addictive and fun game tests your reflexes and clicking skills. The goal is simple: click on the cat to collect points and activate bonuses. Featuring a retro 8-bit design and vibrant music, Cat Clicker offers a casual gaming experience perfect for all audiences.
